attributes.action: discourage the producers of tv drama from using unnecessary background music which makes it harder to hear the speech
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people, especially the older viewers and those with hearing difficulties, find that their enjoyment of television drama is reduced significantly by unnecessary background music played at the same time as speech, making it difficult to hear what is being said. 

I have spoken to people in the television industry and they say that they regularly receive complaints about this, but the problem continues.

Please can this be raised at the highest level with the BBC and other broadcasters.
